title: DHcpEnumSubnets DHCPSubnetINfo DHCPSubnetCLients
extract: A scope is a range of IP addresses that can be leased to DHCP clients on a given subnet. For example, if you have multiple subnets, each with DHCP clients, you have to create multiple scopes.Oct 24, 2003
extract_html: A scope is a range of IP addresses that can be leased to DHCP clients on a given subnet. For example, if you have multiple subnets, each with DHCP clients, you have to create multiple scopes.Oct 24, 2003
